title: London Hughes
description:
Comedian London Hughes joins Kevin Hart to discuss the difficulties of being a black female comic in Britain, getting her own Netflix special, and how comedians like Whoopi Goldberg and Gina Yashere inspired her to come to work in America.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, London hughes)
